VERIFICATE_EMAIL.TITLE: Confirm mail
VERIFICATE_EMAIL.CONTENT_AFTER: a confirmation letter has been sent, click on the confirmation button from the letter and then click the 'I confirmed' button below
VERIFICATE_EMAIL.LINK_TO_CHANGE_PASSWORD: a link to reset your password has been sent, click on the link from the email to continue.
VERIFICATE_EMAIL.CHOOSE_WRONG_EMAIL: Did you enter an incorrect email?

VERIFICATE_EMAIL_CONFIRM.TITLE: Account verified
VERIFICATE_EMAIL_CONFIRM.CONTENT: Your account is verified and the mail is linked correctly.

EMAIL_CONFIRMED.SUCCESS: You have verified your email address
